changeSet.author: sskinner
changeSet.comment: Add key pairs from RATE_CLASS table so that budget calculations prioritize these entries to be processed first in order-of-operations.
changeSet.sql: insert into KRCR_PARM_T (APPL_ID, NMSPC_CD, CMPNT_CD, PARM_NM, VER_NBR, PARM_TYP_CD, VAL, PARM_DESC_TXT, EVAL_OPRTR_CD, OBJ_ID) values('KC', 'KC-B', 'All', 'budgetRateTypesToApplyFandA', '1', 'CONFG', '92,10', 'Rate Class Code and Rate Class Type pairs that will take precedence in order-of-operations during budget computation. These map to entries in the RATE_TYPE table that contain an asterisk in their description. The form of this value is: "rateClassCode1,rateTypeCode1;rateClassCode2,rateTypeCode2;rateClassCode3,rateTypeCode3"', 'A', sys_guid());
changeSet.rollback: delete from KRCR_PARM_T where APPL_ID = 'KC' and NMSPC_CD = 'KC-B' and CMPNT_CD = 'All' and PARM_NM = 'budgetRateTypesToApplyFandA';
